bibdata.title: Draft IEEE Standard Systems and Software Engineering-Guide for Life Cycle Processes
Draft IEEE Standard Systems and Software Engineering-Guide for Life Cycle Processes
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P24748_PDTR3, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Technical Report is a guide for the life cycle management of systems and software based on ISO/IEC 15288 and ISO/IEC 12207. This guide addresses systems concepts and life cycle concepts, models, stages, processes, process application, key points of view, adaptation and use in various domains.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
